text: <https://twitter.com/omalaspinas/status/1327347470674915334|https://twitter.com/omalaspinas/status/1327347470674915334> in Geneva there is a cluster called Yggdrasil

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/omalaspinas|@omalaspinas>: Running some <https://twitter.com/Palabos1|@Palabos1> benchmark on the #yggdrasil the brand new Geneva cluster on 3900 cores (well because I am a beta tester). 8 #GLUPS for a 400^3 lid driven cavity. Let's see what performance we get with 800^3 and 1600^3.
